data.title: Clark Construction Group
data.meta_description:
Clark Construction Group | 214,508 followers on LinkedIn. Clark Construction Group is one of the largest building and infrastructure companies in the United States.

Our portfolio spans every major building market, from public to private, corporate to cultural, education to entertainment, and the infrastructure connecting it all – power, transit, water, and roadways. Since 1906, we’ve been delighting and delivering value to our clients and project partners, providing diverse opportunities for our team, and strengthening the communities where we live.
data.text:
The Elgin Mental Health Center Replacement Power Plant team recently completed the installation of boilers! 🏭 Clark's mechanical trade contractor installed three 500-horsepower medium-pressure, dual-fuel steam boilers in under two days by using a 190-ton mobile crane, moving skates, and hydraulic jacks. This critical milestone brings the project to 90% complete. #ClarkBuildsIL

Clark summer associates recently participated in Capstone Day! 📊🌞 A cornerstone of our summer associate program, the capstone project provides summer associates with the opportunity to find solutions to real obstacles Clark teams face. Thank you to all the summer associates who presented their findings, and congratulations to the winning teams. #TheClarkeXperience

Yesterday, Clark joined VPM, community leaders, local residents, and project partners to kick off construction on VPM’s future headquarters! 📻 Located in the heart of downtown Richmond in Monroe Ward, the 53,000-square-foot media facility will be equipped with modern technology and production capabilities, a state-of-the-art newsroom, and accessible community spaces. #ClarkBuildsRVA

This summer marks the fifth anniversary of the opening of the Stanford Adult Hospital. Located on the Stanford University campus, the 1.2 million-square-foot hospital was designed to prioritize the patient experience and allow flexibility to accommodate the evolving needs of the Stanford community. Integral to delivering this state-of-the-art replacement facility was the immense collaboration between all project stakeholders, including the strong joint venture partnership Clark Construction and McCarthy Building Companies, Inc. forged to deliver this project. Learn more: https://lnkd.in/g4SiMCeu

Fight on! Clark just scored a touchdown at the University of Southern California Athletics West Phase 1 – Football Performance Center. 🏈 This May, the project team kicked off construction of a 90,000-square-foot synthetic turf practice field and completed it just 2.5 months later. The field was handed over on August 1, just in time for the 2024 practice season. But this is just the beginning – Phase 2 of the football program enhancement is set to begin this fall. #ClarkBuildsLA

We are pleased to announce that the Guy F. Atkinson Construction/Clark joint venture team and project partner Hill International, Inc. have been awarded an Engineering News-Record Regional Best Project Award of Merit for the Otay Mesa LPOE Modernization and Expansion project in the Government/Public Building Category. 🏆 Atkinson/Clark expanded and modernized California’s largest international commercial port by designing, constructing, and renovating four buildings, a new parking garage and pedestrian bridge, and rerouting the primary and exit lanes, all while accommodating the unique needs of six federal tenant organizations. #ClarkBuildsSanDiego

From high-rise urban hotels and award-winning luxury resorts to boutique properties, our work on hospitality projects creates welcoming retreats for those away from home. 📸 Pictured: 🪕Grand Hyatt Nashville 🏙️ Marriott Marquis Chicago ⛵ InterContinental DC - The Wharf 🛎️ The Morrow Hotel, DC - Curio Collection by Hilton See more about Clark's hospitality experience: https://lnkd.in/exAhh-S7 Grand Hyatt Nashville | Marriott Hotels | The Wharf | InterContinental Hotels & Resorts | Hilton Hotels & Resorts | HHM Hotels

DACKids Summer Camp joined Clark for an "outside the fence" job site visit and activities at our 600 Fifth project site in downtown Washington, DC. 📐👷♀️ The AIA|DC District Architecture Center provides opportunities for 3rd- to 8th-grade students to explore the fundamentals of architecture, design, and engineering through a unique 5-day camp experience. The Clark team enriched the campers’ experience by providing an up-close look at construction in action! #ClarkBuildsDC #DACKidsCamp

☀️Clark Summer Associate Spotlight☀️ Johan Ureña, a rising senior at New Jersey Institute of Technology (NJIT), has boots on the ground at the Methanol Feed Facilities at the Millard H. Robbins Jr. Regional Reclamation Plant project in Centreville, Virginia. Introduced to writing submittals and talking to trade contractors about product data, Johan is learning more about the construction industry every day while expanding his network. Hear firsthand about Johan’s experience as a Clark summer associate here: https://lnkd.in/gM8aB83b #TheClarkeXperience

Sun's out and so is our Summer Superstructure! 😎 In this edition, you’ll read about: 🦘 The Embassy of Australia exemplifies the best in Australian design and materials. ✈️ Aviation projects across the country serve the travelers who take to the skies. 🔬 Torrey View delivers world-class commercial life science research in San Diego. 💧 Clark Water works with local municipalities to ensure clean water for our communities. Read about these stories, plus much more!
